trekking_trips.title: Annapurna Region Trekking
trekking_trips.description: Explore the diverse landscapes of the Annapurna region, offering panoramic mountain views and rich cultural experiences.

trekking_trips.title: Langtang Region Trekking
trekking_trips.description: Discover the serene beauty of the Langtang Valley, nestled close to Kathmandu, featuring lush forests and traditional villages.

trekking_trips.title: Everest Region Trekking
trekking_trips.description: Embark on a journey to the base of the world's highest peak, experiencing Sherpa culture and breathtaking Himalayan vistas.

trekking_trips.title: Wilderness Region Trekking
trekking_trips.description: Venture into the less-traveled paths of Nepal's wilderness regions, offering solitude and untouched natural beauty.

trekking_trips.title: New Trekking Route
trekking_trips.description: Explore newly opened trekking routes in Nepal, providing fresh adventures and unique cultural encounters.

package_tours.title: Kathmandu Chitwan Tour
package_tours.description: Experience the cultural richness of Kathmandu and the wildlife adventures of Chitwan National Park.

package_tours.title: Bandipur Pokhara Tour
package_tours.description: Discover the charm of Bandipur and the scenic beauty of Pokhara in this short yet thrilling tour.

package_tours.title: Bungy Jump in Nepal
package_tours.description: Experience the thrill of bungy jumping in Nepal, an adventure that promises an adrenaline rush.

package_tours.title: Helicopter Tour In Nepal
package_tours.description: Enjoy aerial views of Nepal's majestic mountains with our exclusive helicopter tours.

package_tours.title: Kathmandu Chitwan Lumbini Via Pokhara Tour
package_tours.description: A comprehensive tour covering Kathmandu, Chitwan, Lumbini, and Pokhara, offering cultural and natural insights.

package_tours.title: Kathmandu Chitwan Pokhara Package Tour
package_tours.description: Explore the highlights of Kathmandu, Chitwan, and Pokhara in this well-rounded package tour.

package_tours.title: Kathmandu Valley Tour
package_tours.description: Embark on a one-day tour of Kathmandu Valley, visiting UNESCO World Heritage sites and experiencing local culture.

package_tours.title: Mountain Flight in Nepal
package_tours.description: Take a scenic mountain flight to witness the grandeur of the Himalayas, including Mount Everest.

package_tours.title: Paragliding in Nepal
package_tours.description: Soar above the landscapes of Nepal with our paragliding adventures, offering stunning aerial views.

peak_climbing.title: Amadablam Expedition in Nepal
peak_climbing.description: Climb the beautiful Ama Dablam in the Everest region, known for its challenging routes and stunning views.

peak_climbing.title: Chulu West Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Embark on an adventurous expedition to Chulu West Peak, offering a true mountaineering experience.

peak_climbing.title: Island Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Climb the popular Island Peak, a favorite among trekkers seeking their first Himalayan summit.

peak_climbing.title: Lobuche Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Challenge yourself with a climb to Lobuche Peak, offering panoramic views of the Everest region.

peak_climbing.title: Mera Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Ascend Mera Peak, Nepal's highest trekking peak, known for its breathtaking vistas.

peak_climbing.title: Pisang Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Climb the fascinating Pisang Peak in the Annapurna region, offering technical challenges and scenic beauty.

peak_climbing.title: Yala Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Experience the thrill of climbing Yala Peak, suitable for beginners seeking Himalayan adventure.

nepal_expeditions.title: Annapurna Expedition in Nepal
nepal_expeditions.description: Embark on a lifetime adventure to summit Annapurna, the world's tenth highest mountain.

nepal_expeditions.title: Baruntse Expedition
nepal_expeditions.description: Challenge yourself with the Baruntse Expedition, known for its technical climbs and stunning scenery.

nepal_expeditions.title: Cho Oyu Expedition in Nepal
nepal_expeditions.description: Climb Cho Oyu, the world's sixth highest mountain, offering a less crowded yet rewarding experience.

nepal_expeditions.title: Everest Expedition in Nepal
nepal_expeditions.description: Take on the ultimate mountaineering challenge by summiting Mount Everest from the south col.

nepal_rafting.title: Bhotekoshi River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: Experience the thrill of whitewater rafting on the Bhotekoshi River, known for its challenging rapids.

nepal_rafting.title: Kali Gandaki River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: Navigate the Kali Gandaki, one of Nepal’s most adventurous rivers, passing through gorges and remote villages.

nepal_rafting.title: Karnali River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: Enjoy a long and exhilarating rafting experience on Nepal’s longest and mightiest river, the Karnali.

nepal_rafting.title: Seti River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: Perfect for beginners and families, the Seti River offers gentle rapids and beautiful scenery.

nepal_rafting.title: Sunkoshi River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: A classic multi-day rafting trip, the Sunkoshi offers both thrilling rapids and serene float sections.

nepal_rafting.title: Trishuli River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: The most popular rafting river in Nepal, ideal for a short adventure from Kathmandu or Pokhara.

chitwan_jungle_safari.title: Chitwan Jungle Safari
chitwan_jungle_safari.description: Explore Nepal’s first national park, Chitwan National Park, home to endangered species like the one-horned rhinoceros and Bengal tiger. Enjoy jeep safaris, canoe rides, bird watching, and Tharu cultural performances.

nepal_paragliding.title: Paragliding in Nepal
nepal_paragliding.description: Fly high above the Himalayas with tandem paragliding in Pokhara, one of the world's top paragliding destinations. Witness stunning aerial views of the Annapurna range and Phewa Lake.

bunzy_jump_in_nepal.title: Bungee Jump in Nepal
bunzy_jump_in_nepal.description: Leap off Nepal's iconic bungee jump bridges above the roaring Bhote Koshi River. This adrenaline-pumping activity is a favorite for thrill-seekers visiting Nepal.

mountain_flight_in_nepal.title: Mountain Flight in Nepal
mountain_flight_in_nepal.description: Enjoy a breathtaking flightseeing experience over the Himalayan range. Witness Mount Everest and other 8000m peaks without the need for trekking.
